mapper.sql:
temp_shipper_member_integral.shipper_member_integral_id as temp_shipper_member_integral_shipper_member_integral_id, temp_shipper_member_integral.member_id as temp_shipper_member_integral_member_id, temp_shipper_member_integral.integral_type_id as temp_shipper_member_integral_integral_type_id, temp_shipper_member_integral.change_type as temp_shipper_member_integral_change_type, temp_shipper_member_integral.change_value as temp_shipper_member_integral_change_value, temp_shipper_member_integral.remark as temp_shipper_member_integral_remark, temp_shipper_member_integral.creater as temp_shipper_member_integral_creater, temp_shipper_member_integral.create_time as temp_shipper_member_integral_create_time, temp_shipper_member_integral.updater as temp_shipper_member_integral_updater, temp_shipper_member_integral.update_time as temp_shipper_member_integral_update_time
,temp_shipper_member.member_name as temp_shipper_member_integral_member_name ,temp_shipper_integral_type.integral_type as temp_shipper_member_integral_integral_type_name ,temp_creater.user_cn_name as temp_shipper_member_integral_creater_display ,temp_updater.user_cn_name as temp_shipper_member_integral_updater_display

LEFT JOIN t_shipper_member temp_shipper_member ON temp_shipper_member.member_id =temp_shipper_member_integral.member_id LEFT JOIN t_shipper_integral_type temp_shipper_integral_type ON temp_shipper_integral_type.integral_type_id =temp_shipper_member_integral.integral_type_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_shipper_member_integral.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_shipper_member_integral.updater
